items.name: Charger
items.description: War horses bred for strength and courage in battle. Adapted to short bursts of speed; not suited to long-distance riding.

items.name: Dapple-doff
items.description: Mighty, shaggy-furred draft horses, bred for their great strength. Dull-witted and easily spooked.

items.name: Hop-clopper
items.description: Stocky, green-maned draft horses beloved by Prigwort breweries. Get tetchy without their daily pint of ale.

items.name: Mule
items.description: Stubborn horse/donkey cross-breeds used as beasts of burden. Unlike other horses, mules can be taken underground.

items.name: Prigwort prancer
items.description: Lightly built horses adapted to run at high speed. Fond of snacking on acorns in the autumn.

items.name: Yellow-flank
items.description: Tall, slender horses favoured by nobility, with flowing, silver manes and golden dappling along their sides. The haughty, laughing neigh of the yellow-flank bespeaks the breed's rumoured fairy ancestry.

_metadata.extraction_note: Review and correct this data before importing
